lender.name: Max
lender.occupational_info: Student at college studying economics and electrical engineering

lender.name: Vicki
lender.occupational_info: consultant

lender.name: Jim & Paula
lender.loan_because: People need to have a helping hand to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We currently work as teachers in SW Wyoming

lender.name: Summer Kumar
lender.loan_because: I relied on loans so that I could go to college, so I know how important loans are in giving people a head start.
lender.occupational_info: I write about art and literature for magazines and newspapers in the U.S.

lender.name: Sue Ann
lender.loan_because: this seems like a good way to shake someone's hand.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange healthcare services for the elderly and the disabled. I am also a poet and the editor of a poetry journal, 10x3 plus. The painting I've included here was done by Spanish artist, Dan Casado.

lender.name: TacoMan2000
lender.loan_because: I want tacos to be cheaper.
lender.occupational_info: Moose.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I'm curious

lender.name: Dagny
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a hand up not a hand out and that's what Kiva is. Nearly every American could give - excuse me - LOAN someone $25. Just imagine if we all did - or more!
lender.occupational_info: I advise Hi-Tech companies in their growth phase and help manage their staffing effort

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: offsetting inequity is possible. i would like to contribute to better world and kiva helps me do that.

lender.name: Don & Dahlia (the dog)
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirt of the human race. That the solution to world crisis is unity and cooperation. The key to destroying poverty is through education. People should have the opportunity to improve themselves by providing and contributing to their community and family. Give a person a fish and the will eat dinner, teach a person to fish they will eat for life. The beauty of this concept is the "pay it forward". Instead of removing the interest from the repayed loan, you use it to finance another business in a different region. The result is the original borrow is given the opportunity to assist another business. It is a beautiful plan.
lender.occupational_info: My work consist of translation and interpetation of foreign documents and international event.

lender.name: Dan & Mary
lender.loan_because: we travel around the world quite a bit and want an effective way to play a small role in improving poverty and economic inefficiencies that we see

lender.name: Carter
lender.occupation: Director of Finance & Operations at CleanFish
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have a chance to live their lives free from poverty.

lender.name: Svein Harald
lender.loan_because: I like to think of what the loans helps make happen - started with a beach hut at Samoa and a car repair shop in Azerbaijan. Will go there and have a look;-)

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: Giving connects you with your spirit.

lender.name: Thor
lender.occupational_info: I'm a materials engineer, develop and improve plastic materials for various uses from baby diapers to agricultural films.

lender.name: MARY LOUISE
lender.loan_because: It is something I can afford to do that will help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for a not-for-profit faith-based community services agency.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I admire and respect entrepreneurs in difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing Consultant. Author.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I use to live in a 3rd world country and am saddened by all the people I never helped. I want to change that now.
lender.occupational_info: Making websites for the internet

lender.name: R.J. and Rachel
lender.loan_because: Empowering others to become self-sufficient is the answer.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because:
The Lord has provided us (human kind) with plenty of food, water, and the potential for all to prosper. All it takes is trust, generosity, and a lack of greed.
I want you and your family to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: Linux/Unix Administrator

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I see this as a great opportunity to empower individuals.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do....helping others in ways that they then can help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Preparation of income tax returns and monthly accounting services.

lender.name: Fredrik
lender.loan_because: It's a clich√©, but micro-loans really are a brilliant way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a free-lance creative producer for TV production companies. Basically, I fashion the content for each episode of whatever TV-show I'm currently working on.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: The money I'm lending is little more than pocket change to me, but deployed through the micro-lenders, it makes a real difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who lend large amounts of money to companies in the United States.

lender.name: Rick Hargett
lender.loan_because: As a serial entrepreneur, I understand the passion and risk it takes to launch and grow a new business. Raising funds can be quite difficult, I am happy to help.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and make a difference in individual lives.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I'm a single parent. I know what it's like to try to make ends meet,but I still have so much more than these people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells RVs (recreational vehicals). I clean them inside and outside. I also drive the company car to pick up parts and other things.

lender.name: Chin-An
lender.loan_because: I believed in them and because I think they need more than I do. I hope this will make a difference in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I have a good job, I love my work. I work behind a desk in front of a computer. I consider I am very lucky.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: ...its a good thing to do :)
lender.occupational_info: I supervise a team of people who take calls for various non-profit organizations in the USA who accept donations by telephone.

lender.name: Pastor Shane
lender.loan_because: God so loved the world that He gave His only son Jesus that whosoever believes in Him should not perish but have everlasting life.
lender.occupational_info: I serve as Director of Ministry for a Global Prayer request ministry.

lender.name: Sybrand
lender.occupational_info: Developing production processes for vaccines that are produced on a mammalian cell line.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I did a report on Togo in elementary school. I'd like my future grandchildren to write about Togo's growth and economic prosperity. Helping one person at a time to be more financially responsible and a meaningful contributor to Togo's economy may just be a stepping stone in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: Bad things happen when good people do nothing. I am a teacher and strive to lead by example in this case by doing small things in hopes that they lead to greater things.

lender.name: David Lauri
lender.loan_because: my uncle Bill did -- he thought helping people, not just family but others around the world, was important.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to help people share information.

lender.name: P-Chan
lender.loan_because: I visited Vietnam in 2006 and I saw how hard it is to make a living over there. I also have family in Vietnam and I want to help those that I can.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lender.name: Jose A
lender.loan_because: Fostering the entrepenur spirit is the most effective mechanism available to control poverty while promoting freedom. Join us in the lending group "Invisible Hand" if you share this view.

lender.name: Onno
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people with small sums of money.

lender.name: Michelle & Ian
lender.loan_because: We were inspired by Kiva's mission and became aware of it through a piece viewed on PBS. What a noble and wonderful way for people to help one another!
lender.occupational_info: Ian works in finance as a fund manager for a large global bank. Michelle is carrying their first baby and will take on the role of parent in July.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: The money goes out, it does some good, and it gets paid back. Then it can go out again. Really, I don't lose anything, and the people who are helped by it stay standing on their own two feet -- it's a loan, not a handout. There's some pride there that shouldn't be given up.
lender.occupational_info: I teach music to children -- mostly how to play classical western music instruments, but sometimes just what music is and how to listen and describe it. I just got back from eight months teaching ESL in South Korea, and am currently a substitute teacher and musician in northwest Ohio.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I want to support other women who would like to be in business for themselves but have fewer opportunities than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I write activities and background material for science (and other) textbooks. I also weave, knit, act, and dance.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe its an efficient method to provide capital to ambitious entrepreneurs without easy access. I'm glad that I can do a small part to help.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for a company that builds tests for women with breast cancer. Our products help doctors and patients pick the best treatment option (to minimize the likelihood of cancer recurrence) for the patient based on doing an analysis of the tumor.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: By helping each other we can all achieve our dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large public website in the UK. I am also an acupuncturist.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jace
lender.loan_because: i have been to Africa several times working primarily with Athletes In Action, and have fallen in love with Kenya and her people. i am so pleased to find another way to bless friends in Kenya... through small entreprenurial loans
lender.occupational_info: In my work i do marketing, communications & development for a fast growing construction company that is pioneering affordable home communities in Western Canada.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I like to share
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my time inputting information and far less time outputting information. I am an inefficient machine.

lender.name: Paul & Debi
lender.loan_because: I heard a minister say: "If God knows the future & it's all been predestined then why should we bother to pray & help others?"... His answer was: "It's God's way of letting 'us' be a part of it"... I want to be a part of it!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Home Business owner and Internet Radio Talk Show host at www.HomeBusinessRadio.com

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We're all riding this rock together

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I want to share the bountiful blessings of the Lord Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I work with doctors to help people.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I represent people in court regarding family law issues, such as custody, spousal and child support, access to children, restraining orders.

lender.name: Shasta
lender.loan_because: My work is so local. This is my opportunity to stay connected to the global.
lender.occupational_info: Advocate in local politics to protect natural areas and farmlands from development, and create communities with affordable housing, a variety of transit options, and good environmental quality.

lender.name: Lisset
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with business people in need

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I'm expecting to make a big profit. This is a profit thing, right?

lender.name: Leona
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone out in need. It feels good to be able to help someone else and it's a real honor.
lender.occupational_info: I am a math teacher at an inner-city school. I don't make a lot of money, but I certainly make enough to be able to help some people.

lender.name: Chaotic Christians
lender.loan_because: God calls us to be people of charity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and the internet

lender.name: davehunt00
lender.loan_because: I respect the hard work the borrowers are doing and want to help them build their businesses and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites like this one and help manage all the steps involved.

lender.name: [UF] j.b and KS
lender.loan_because: I was overwhelmed by requests from charities who just gave without the intent of helping people long-term, and when I gave to them they sold my name to others. I'd much rather support the "teach a man to fish" philosophy.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own small business, where I manage and create websites like the one here, along with email servers and related systems.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I could have just as easily been born to a family and a country with a lower socioeconomic status than what I am fortune to have been.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to understand what goes on inside the human brain.

lender.name: Lorien
lender.loan_because: I want to try to make a difference. I am leading by example for my children, family, and friends.

lender.name: Matt & Kym
lender.occupational_info: I run a small teaching company.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: It's a cool idea.. love it!! Introduced to the scheme by my brother.. that's x-mas 07 sorted for all those awkward pressies, and someone out there can improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: IT support - working with voip solutions. Bit dull really : )

lender.name: Joelle
lender.loan_because: my brother gave me a KIVA gift certificate for christmas. What a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I am a midwife, working in Manitoba.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: It's cool watching people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help fix people's telephones.

lender.name: Pati and Mike
lender.loan_because: We're convinced that the microloans can have a very direct effect on people's lives. Kiva really helps to make the world a smaller place.
lender.occupational_info: Pati is an advice nurse. Mike teaches U.S. History in middle school.

lender.name: Pauline & Mindy
lender.loan_because: I remember what what it feels like to be poor and wish these individuals the best of luck in their endeavours.
lender.occupational_info: retired grandmother and I have never been so busy!

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because:
"Where you live should not decide whether you live or whether you die." -- Bono, "Crumbs From Your Table."
The happenstance of birthplace has made me one of the wealthiest 1% of people in the world: I'm a middle-class Mid-Western stay-at-home-mom. Few of my peers would recognise themselves as such -- the average American suburbanite might be aware that they among the top 50% in the US, but when they think of "wealth" they think of Bill Gates and Donald Trump. Compared to the top 0.001%, we in the top 1% may have a modest lifestyle -- but compared the other 99% of humanity we are rich beyond their wildest dreams.
Neither my wealth, nor another's poverty, has come to us in the vacuum of our own unaided acts. Where we are born is the single greatest factor in deciding our lot in life. I've been lucky, but I don't think I have ever shown the strength, determination and ingenuity of the entrepreneurs requesting loans through Kiva. I admire and respect these men and women -- and the least I can do as a moral person is to share with them some of the wealth that chance has given me.
"We are born to be killers, of plants if nothing else. And we are killed. It's a bloody business, living off others so that eventually they will live off you. Still, here and there in the food web one finds spaces where there's room for something more than just killing and being killed. "Imagine the island of blue in the middle of a tropical storm, its eye of peace. "You must admit that the hurricane is there. To do otherwise is self-deception, which in nature is fatal, or worse, hypocritical. Even honest, decent, generous folk must fight to survive when the driving winds blow. "And yet, such folk will also do whatever they can, whenever they can, to expand the blue. To increase that gentle, centered realm where patience prevails and no law is made by tooth or claw. "You are never entirely helpless, nor ever entirely in it for yourself. You can always do something to expand the blue." -- David Brin, "Earth."

lender.name: Verge
lender.loan_because: I fully understand the challenges of funding a business and this is an opportunity for me to help someone. I like the Kive model and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are a construction company that specializes in remodeling and building out kitchens and bathrooms.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I love the stories and want to help out in any way I can; but most of all I want to support a system like this which I hope becomes more accepted and used. Harnessing the power of online communities and at the same time have a direct impact on effecting people's daily lives on a global scale is a really cool thing that I want to be part of.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a very large technology company and manage a group of engineers who are working to make the web a secure place to conduct business, such as this service, on.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help end poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I manage databases.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: This system supports those with the entrepreneurial spirit in other countries, which lets them improve their own lives, in a means better than charity.

lender.name: Georg Pagenstedt
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Tibor
lender.loan_because: I know the bells are ringing for me

lender.name: Mia and Michael
lender.loan_because: we are going on a trip to Tanzania this summer in honor of Michael's 16th birthday. We would like to give something back to the wonderful place we will visit.

lender.name: Cindy & Dwhyna
lender.loan_because: The money we save by not hiring professional photographers has GOT to go somewhere!
lender.occupational_info: Feeding strays and sending out good Karma.

lender.name: Bill & Mary Lou
lender.loan_because: We have our own small business started with limited capital. We believe that hard work and dedication can lead to success. We have been blessed and want to help others reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: We own a plastic distribution company specializing in high performance materials. We purchase from mills around the world and resell to manufacturers in our local area.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in the worth of people around the world, and I hope my children will as well.

lender.name: Orsay
lender.loan_because: world needs a radical change in the lifestyle, social status, most importantly in income levels, unfortunately we dont have that power to change everything drastically but a small step can change everything gradually.
lender.occupational_info: i work as an accountant in construction business, not a dynamic work , needs lot of familarity with figures.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Money needs to do something for people.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: God's grace allows me to do so, and because one person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: events planning for a large ophthalmology/pharmaceuticals company

lender.name: Brandon & Shawna
lender.loan_because: We simply want to bless others as the Lord has blessed us.
lender.occupational_info: Financial Advisor and Full-time Mom

lender.name: Dimitris
lender.occupational_info: I help companies with their computers.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to give to someone who really wants to build something for themselves. They aren't just looking for a handout.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an excellent way to help active entrepreneurs who might otherwise be overlooked.

lender.name: Righteousness Amuses Me
lender.loan_because: Life breaks everyone. Some get stronger in the broken places. - Hemingway
lender.occupational_info: I'm Winston Wolf. I solve problems.

lender.name: Mickey
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help making their dreams come true.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I've been helped in the past and I'd like to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self-employed health researcher.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I feel so lucky in my life; I have a job that pays well, and a wonderful husband and son, and I think this is such a great idea and chance to share with someone who's really working hard to make a better life for himself and his family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a technical translation service, we translate material such as crane service manuals and tractor safety decals into other languages, for equipment that's being sold overseas.

lender.name: Trey
lender.loan_because: "The American Dream" is not solely American.

lender.name: Yoh&Natsuko
lender.loan_because: We visited Kenya on our honeymoon this Feb. and wanted to get involved with the people living there.
lender.occupational_info: my wife&I work for a Japanese TV production company.it's an opportunity to encounter great people, ideas and experience.

lender.name: Mr. Bitters
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It sounded like a nice thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work in a shoe store selling shoes

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of microfinance to help hardworkers overcome the hardships and bring needed services to their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large insurance company. My job involves buying needed materials and managing the company's computer systems.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have worked in microfinance in Chicago and in Durban, South Africa and know that these loans make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I provide small loans to diverse business owners in the Chicago land area.

lender.name: Arun
lender.loan_because: Kiva rocks!!

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I believe Jesus Christ wants me to help others

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the resources to be able to.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: This feels like an interesting way to assist others in improving their lives and their communities, rather than simply mailing a check to a charity or npo.
lender.occupational_info: Day job, designing systems to make real estate transactions more efficient. Side job, preparing music and humor audio and writing to make laughter more common.

lender.name: Wally
lender.loan_because: I know I can make a difference in this world one Person at a time

lender.name: Chris Canfield
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance. Some of us happened to be given a few chances, and it's our responsibility to spread those around.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: I have a great life and I want to give back to others.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It is within my means to help others toward their goals.

lender.name: Euisan
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: medical student

lender.name: My_ma_&_ba
lender.loan_because: Every time I make a loan, I send loving energies forward to Ma who is in Heaven now and Ba who lives in Singapore. Every loan is love sent by them and every loan sends love to them.
lender.occupational_info: My life work is to serve. I haven't been able to do much of it in a very tangible way but I'd like to think that I try to every chance I get. Kiva has given me a much needed outlet to do exactly that. Good work, all at Kiva!

lender.name: Scarlett
lender.loan_because: 1. The UN, and by UN I mean the power-tool of the US, and it's branches aren't doing anything you could call fair or non-exploitive while keeping a straight face 2. Lawrence Summers
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying at a liberal arts school to hopefully find a way to change the mindsets of capitalist Washington as well as those who choose to remain pleasently oblivious to the exploitation and evil that exists in this world market

lender.name: webtutor
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good idea

lender.name: Magne Rekdal
lender.loan_because: Trust and partnerships bring the world small steps forward.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for users in the health care sector.

lender.name: Hoke
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is the only form of true sustainable development

lender.name: Christophe
lender.loan_because: People need money.
lender.occupational_info: I design, program and implement software in support of the business needs of my clients. It's an area where I can be truly creative without otherwise having any artistic talent.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help a little bit when I can.
lender.occupational_info: Infectious disease prevention researcher

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I believe in the inherent abilities of us all.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-governmental organization that contributes to grassroots programs all over the world. I am also a student of microfinance and resource creation.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It's a gift that keeps on giving. I enjoy seeing people succeed around the world.

lender.name: Bethel Youth Group
lender.loan_because: We care and we can. It's a small amount of money to help someone get a better life. We have money and we care!
lender.occupational_info: We are a Mennonite youth group from Winnipeg, Canada.

lender.name: YBP Guide
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is a gift taught from the Bible. I feel honored to 'teach men to fish', instead of just giving them fish.
lender.occupational_info: We have discussions, online, about the impact and social relevance of being Black in America.

lender.name: Roberts-Gaal family
lender.loan_because: this is a way to get our kids directly involved in helping others.

lender.name: Diane & Steve
lender.loan_because: Hoping to make a small difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Gian Mario
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to reach serenity and independance.

lender.name: Julie Roberts
lender.occupation: We Sell the Genuine Four Leaf Clover Accessories
lender.loan_because: We want to bring good luck to those in need and also to contribute back into the community. We help by planting seeds which can possibly spring forth into life-sustaining plants for these entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: Many customers have been touched after getting our clovers and have come back telling us that they have good luck in their jobs, careers, relationships as well as lottery. Similarly, we also would like to help out those in the third world countries by providing what help we can by helping aspiring businesses grow.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: how can I not? There is so much need.

lender.name: Stephanie & Andrew
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed to have had good opportunities in life; we'd like to help others find their way in life too.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations develop policies and practices that make working for a company rewarding for its employees and profitable for the company.

lender.name: Lang
lender.loan_because: Sometimes a little makes all the difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make high strength polymer-based thin films and measure its physicial and chemical properties using scattered laser light.

lender.name: Ric
lender.loan_because: I have so much in comparison to most of the world's population.
lender.occupational_info: I do research to prevent obesity in children.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in non-governmental solutions.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of programmers who create software for the internet.

lender.name: lauren
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to empower people and to really help change someone's life for the better. I know people helped me along the way and i want to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I run a large restaurant in downtown tokyo

lender.name: Doug & Giselle
lender.loan_because: We want to show our kids how to be part of a larger world outside of the US. And we really want to help!
lender.occupational_info: Doug works for a technology company in the US and writes books. Giselle is an artist.

lender.name: Seth Mowshowitz
lender.loan_because: I believe that the world‚Äôs financial system is the main contributing factor to global inequality. Kiva helps to mitigate this situation by preventing investment capital from being captured within the system. The result is that individuals and small businesses from deprived areas who need loans to thrive can request and receive loans successfully and without exploitation.
lender.occupational_info: As a designer my philosophy is user-centred. As a musician I focus my efforts on developing the language of a movement towards social equality.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to support someone who has the courage to run their own business, despite the difficulties.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and truly believe that every little bit helps. =)

lender.name: Ray & Cindy
lender.loan_because: We want to help make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a community library in a semi-rural area of Colorado.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I strongly support what Kiva is doing to elevate the life situations of entrepreneurs in developing countries...plus my sister works for Kiva and the whole team is awesome!
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs achieve their goals and promote international trade development

lender.name: Gjagiello
lender.loan_because: I realize that the amount I spend on lunch in a week here in San Francisco could probably start a business in other parts of the world. Credit has helped me, and now that microlending has proven itself, I'm happy to help others improve their situation.

lender.name: ET Evans
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: i am a farmer in colorado, usa.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Executive in an international capital markets firm. Banking for big companies.

lender.name: Sherpani
lender.loan_because: We at Sherpani look for ways to give back!
lender.occupational_info: Breathe | Give | Stretch | Go - Lifestyle Bags for Women

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others set up a sustainable infrastructure for their business and economy.
lender.occupational_info: I work for major technology companies by promoting their business to various forms of media (newspapers, magazines, websites, etc).

lender.name: World Wings Miami
lender.occupation: philanthropic former Pan Am flight attendants
lender.occupational_info: The mission of World Wings International Inc. is to unite former Pan American World Airways flight attendants in order to promote philanthropic, civic and cultural activities through our special friendships.

lender.name: barbara
lender.loan_because: I know it makes a difference and it makes me feel great

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I am so thankful for the opportunities and freedom experienced as a female in the United States. This is my way of giving back.

lender.name: Allegra
lender.loan_because: build a family business, build a better community. Build a community, build a country. Build a country, build a better world.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I know that starting and growing a business is a challenging endeavor . I believe that every entrepreneur deserves the opportunity to achieve success and it makes me feel good to help.
lender.occupational_info: I have a company that sells attraction passes to tourists

lender.name: Federica
lender.loan_because: I think it's the best way to help people help themselves, with the dignity given by their own job. I hate banks!Banks are ruining the world.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own business in Tuscany, Italy. My country is not really rich and I am not rich either, but I try to keep up with what I think I am and can do. I work in the field of communication. I have a 10 years old son. I love the sea shore and the colors.

lender.name: justsomeguy
lender.loan_because: There are other people in the world that can make better use of a relatively small amount of money than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I assist with maintaining a medium sized computer network.

lender.name: Tom and Meg
lender.loan_because: We are passionate about development and convinced there is enough wealth in this world for everyone to have a fulfilling, healthy life. What's spare change to us can be life-changing to others.

lender.name: Anita Grant Ltd
lender.loan_because: It's great to help entrepreneurs in the developing world move one step closer to their dream of prosperity, one entrepreneur at a time!
lender.occupational_info: Anita Grant Ltd is a family owned business. We provide all natural & organic hand crafted hair care & skin care goodies for people with dry sensitive skin and curly, coily, natural, Afro hair.

lender.name: Gopinath
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have the confidence of succeeding, if given right opportunities and resources. Kiva provides such a great opportunity connecting us with the people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an industry which creates software solutions to enable business processes for a large Company with a complex business model.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I know what a privilege it is to have good work opportunities, and I think everyone in the world should have them too.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: this is a great site-- so much opportunity to help

lender.name: Sierra
lender.loan_because: I've been so fortunate to have strangers invest in my education and future, and I'm working to give it back.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: When I've traveled to impoverished areas, I have seen the need for this type of lending. I love the community aspect of Kiva and the fact that my initial donation can just keep on giving.
lender.occupational_info: painter, potter, graphic artist, herbalist

lender.name: Elliott
lender.loan_because: I want to be able so say have have helped someone else in need!
lender.occupational_info: Being a baby is rough! I eat, sleep, drink milk, and well play! It is an important job, but someone has to do it. My other job is to make a contribution to the future.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make all the financial transactions for my company and maintain records.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: To repay what others have given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying agriculture, trying to understand how we can produce enough food for ourselves, while still protecting our land for the future.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.

lender.name: The Riley-Burnett Family
lender.loan_because: We all share the same hopes and desires, to take care of our families and be safe and happy. We hope that our small loans help the people who receive them accomplish their dreams.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: Helping others to a better life is both easy and rewarding
lender.occupational_info: I repair electronic erquipment in the aviation field.

lender.name: Tromzilla
lender.loan_because: I think that people can change the world by making money to buy stuff.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so. I have raised 4 healthy, independent adult children with my husband; others should be able to share that deep satisfaction.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher in a secondary school, experienced at both the high school and middle school levels.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I was interested in the stories of each woman; one a 53 year old widow (which I am) and the other a single middle aged woman, both trying to maintain their independence and dignity at this station in life. I imagine the challenge is 10 times harder for them than I could ever imagine. I extend God's blessings through the funding I'm able to provide each beautiful lady!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a performing artist/producer and support all forms of the cultural arts in the diverse City of Los Angeles, California, USA. They would include visual arts, dance, music, theatre, film, TV & radio.

lender.name: Sahil
lender.loan_because: we live in a world of ridiculous excess. there is no reason anyone should be living without basic needs, or dying because of a lack of food, water and shelter.
lender.occupational_info: i am a medical student at the university of chicago

lender.name: Wey Ling
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by many in my life and would like to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school at Miami University and run on the womens track and field team.

lender.name: Mayo Family
lender.loan_because: it keeps my checkbook... the world in balance.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: We are all in this world together.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that work with food learn the ways to keep food safe so that no one becomes sick from eating it.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I think someone needs it more then me...
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers :)

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: If i can help someone out, why shouldn't I?
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying towards a Master's degree in computer science.

lender.name: Alli
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful idea for bringing us all a little bit closer to neighbors around the world.

lender.name: Julia
lender.occupational_info: Global justice activist and future elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the dignity of humanity
lender.occupational_info: I am a Study Monitor, who helps in the discovery of new medicines

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: there are some great people out there with ambitions that just need that little extra support to make "great" a realization.
lender.occupational_info: I help put people in the same financial situation they were in just before a loss caused in a motor vehicle accident.

lender.name: Sohee
lender.loan_because: This is the smartest way to help people who are in need and with small effort, they can hope for better life.
lender.occupational_info: university student

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: life doesn't give equal opportunity to everyone, and I have been fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an electronics manufacturing plant.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because:
Starting small businesses has been wonderful for me ... certainly happy to provide some support to those that want to do the same.
Any friends reading this profile, send me an e-mail and I'll be happy to gift you a $50 credit here so you can get started.

lender.name: Glam
lender.loan_because: I want to help people when I'm still alive.

lender.name: Jens Peter
lender.loan_because: I find it the best way to support people

lender.name: Nicola Battista (DjB)
lender.loan_because: Because I believe in the "teaching to fish" philosophy, and it is just fair that we help people less fortunate than us in getting a better life.

lender.name: Luigi e Patrizia
lender.loan_because: we work for people's empowerment
lender.occupational_info: researcher on social issues

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place with my contribution, even though it's small.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: To show respect for those that wish to help themselves

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It's what God wants us to do for one another.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have some savings I do not need currently and that others could put to better use.
lender.occupational_info: I consult with farmers, helping them to feed their cows with a goal of keeping them healthy and productive

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to give people opportunities to succeed. Life is hard enough.

lender.name: Steve & Adriana
lender.loan_because: There are many problems in our world today. Making a difference, one household at a time, is a solution.
lender.occupational_info: I love to show different sides of issues through film.

lender.name: Laiken
lender.loan_because: I wnat to helop out, even though it's just a little.

lender.name: [UF] Hyzenthlay
lender.loan_because: I'd like the idea of lending to those who have taken the first step and established a business.
lender.occupational_info: CPa is short for Certified Public Accoutnant. I am an accountant with a little extra training, and a ethical commitment to providing correct data.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to see the true value of money.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that works with computers to create interesting web pages that people all-over-the-world can view on their computers by connecting to the Internet.

lender.name: Guadalupe
lender.loan_because: This is an easy way to help people all over the world to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Helping the residents of the City of Chicago with their City service needs.

lender.name: Brenda & Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe these people really need the money to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired from working at a Junior College serving students with disabilities.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupation: Owner/Manager of a small localization studio.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the University of Washington.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: KIVA is such a great way to offer good people a hand-up, rather than a hand-out.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in another person's life. I have had very good fortune in my life and am responsible to help others as a result.
lender.occupational_info: The photo is of my sweet cat, Sparky. She likes to sit next to me on the sofa and bathe and sleep while I'm watching tv. I have been a professional actor since 1978 but have not pursued it in several years. I work as a proofreader in advertising as my source of income.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Robinson
lender.occupational_info: Sales

lender.name: DAWN
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves. I am inspired by the way the entrepreneurs use small amount soif money to work their way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher - passionate about education, learning and developing knowledge and skills. I am also passionate about health and wellbeing.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupational_info: I sit in an office and draw all day. I don't feel a direct connection between my work and helping people. And I like to help people, so doing things like volunteering and helping Kiva fills a need that my daily life can't.

lender.name: Brendan Anthony
lender.loan_because: of the smug sense of superiority I can now wield over my friends and enemies. ;p

lender.name: Mrs. Dibas class
lender.whereabouts: Broderick Montessori School, Dana Point CA
lender.occupation: Elementary class at Broderick Montessori School
lender.loan_because: We collect pennies and other money during the school year and needed a good cause for our donations!
lender.occupational_info: We are an elementary school class of 1st, 2nd & 3rd graders at Broderick Montessori School.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who works hard to make their life better. Everyone in the world deserves a chance at a good life and I hope I can help.

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I help students at a university with scholarship funds.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I know that a small amount of money can make a huge difference in a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: i am a bookkeeper at an independent newspaper.

lender.name: elledee
lender.loan_because: people want to be empowered, not pitied.
lender.occupational_info: I'm part of the process that makes sure people who commit crimes get a just punishment.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I believe that people who want to improve their lives are worth supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I work multiple jobs. I am a Director of an Information Technology (computer) team for a company. I also work as a projectionist showing movies at two movie theatres. And I work as a paramedic on ambulance.

lender.name: jackson's family
lender.loan_because: we want to do something good!
lender.occupational_info: we play, learn, tell stories and help artists build their careers.

lender.name: Caroline Sun
lender.loan_because: Years from now, I'll feel better about the money I loaned on Kiva than the money I spent on myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am making a program that runs on an iPad.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: no u
lender.occupational_info: It's k

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Computer analyst

lender.name: Chetta
lender.loan_because: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
lender.occupational_info: I hire people for large technology companies.

lender.name: Thea
lender.loan_because: This makes a difference in a practical way, and brings the personal dreams of others, to fruition. Each Forward Step enhances the value of your first.
lender.occupational_info: Creating and sharing lots of inspiring material to set people in motion toward fulfilling their personal goals.

lender.name: jillian
lender.loan_because: I want to see people succeed owning their own businesses and making their own choices. The global economy has left so many across the globe at a serious disadvantage.
lender.occupational_info: I serve coffee at an independently owned fair trade/organic cafe.

lender.name: thilo
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: Helping people is so much more rewarding than thinking about how much you wish you could help them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops medical devices for treating stroke.

lender.name: Ajit
lender.loan_because: Someone Deserves it !
lender.occupational_info: Information Tech.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: Sitting in a Ha Noi cafe writing software while sipping ca phe nau da.

lender.name: Derya
lender.loan_because: it helps me save money, and it helps other people at the same time.

lender.name: Anne Sophie
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a shot at providing for their family and fulfilling their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I help small business owners be more successful at what they are doing.

lender.name: Nik
lender.loan_because: These people are the most amazing entrepreneurs on the planet. No Silicon Valley entrepreneur can compete with these stories. Truly amazing individuals and I am glad I can play a small role in their success.
lender.occupational_info: Originally from Australia, I am responsible for business development in Silicon Valley for Gartner working with start-ups/emerging technology providers. Any company I sign-up this year, I pledge to donate a portion of my commission to the entrepreneurs featured on Kiva.

lender.name: EmptyKoolAidCup
lender.loan_because: it helps change the world... Why do you do it?
lender.occupational_info: Lending money out to one person at a time...

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful way to bring people together all over the world. Those of us who can lend are greatly enriched by the stories of those who are striving so hard to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I have the good fortune to be a history teacher in a Waldorf high school.

lender.name: Reed
lender.loan_because: Micro-Financing is a great way to help people in developing nations to secure a foothold on the economic ladder. It's amazing how such a simple idea can have such a far-reaching and positive life-changing effect, on both the borrower's life and mine.
lender.occupational_info: I manage 16 AT&T/Cingular store locations located in Orange County and the Inland Empire (CA, USA).

lender.name: maya
lender.loan_because: i love.

lender.name: Ole
lender.loan_because: I can, it works, Kiva rocks.
lender.occupational_info: Figuring out how microfinance works.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: Working with high school students making art.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful way for the average person to help others where one can actually see the results. It's a more personal experience.
lender.occupational_info: A nurse practitioner has an advanced nursing degree. I provide primary care to adults with a concentration on the elderly.

lender.name: Zoey
lender.loan_because: We have no control over where we are born, or the circumstances under which we are born.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: [en] I think this system is very interesting. | [pt] Porque penso que este sistema √© muito intereressante

lender.name: nitrofly
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Internet and mobile device software consultant.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I feel that even though I am a college student struggling to get by financially I am able to donate to those who need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: The best thing I have ever done is traveled to New Orleans during Spring Break '06 to help with relief work.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves opportunity. I have been helped out in my life and want to pass along the help.

lender.name: Le Bouedec
lender.occupation: agent du minist√®re de la culture

lender.name: jonas
lender.loan_because: I like the mix of donation and investment. I strongly believe in support with a longterm effect. I am also involved in a private aid project in Sri Lanka, check out www.hitanava.ch [page in German].
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that companies communicate and advertise in a conscious way by providing them with a strong identity, good looking print material and new ideas.

lender.name: steven otto
lender.occupational_info: InReturn is establishing and managing private equity funds to service small and medium sized companies in emerging markets in order to make financial and social returns

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: in order to emerge from poverty, the poor need access to credit. The market is not set up to enable this, to enable them to launch their own enterprises (small or big). Kiva is opening this door to credit!

lender.name: boyd
lender.loan_because: I have recieved a lot of blessings in my life and I need to give back
lender.occupational_info: a clinic physician

lender.name: Steffen
lender.loan_because: I hope that these entrepeneurs can have impact on a whole community

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: Money truly changes lives.
lender.occupational_info: God's Work

lender.name: Ale
lender.loan_because: It's normal... simply normal!

lender.name: Phi Theta Kappa
lender.loan_because: At a regional convention, I was challenged to use $100 to make the biggest possible difference. I chose to invest it in Kiva and track where the money goes.

lender.name: Emily
lender.occupation: student at the International School of the America

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: My family has ties to Azerbaijan and I want to help various people get a step forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the IT field and manage projects from start to end.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I started my own business and I want to give others the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I make quilts for my family and friends to enjoy. I sell the supplies to make them so others can as well.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in personal responsibility, and working hard for what you have. I do not believe in charity hand outs. I look forward to seeing more and more people pull themselves out of poverty, and succeed in their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a health care company, keeping all the computers running.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I care about those that are less fortunate than I am, and I believe we all should help to end poverty. Kiva is an excellent tool and concept, and I support it 100%
lender.occupational_info: I am a web developer. With the explosion of the internet which connects everyone globally, I use my skills and know how to better mankind.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Why not.

lender.name: DukeDeLaet
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. While I have a strong heart for charity, this type of loan allows me to get "the best bang for my buck" when it comes to helping people create change, because it can be used over and over again.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I work for a neighborhood Chamber of Commerce that help businesses grow in Lincoln Park.

lender.name: St. John's High School
lender.loan_because: everyone derseves an opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because:
I try to live by these principles:
"Love one another. Help one another. Pray for one another."
lender.occupational_info: I manage the process of setting up health and welfare benefits.

lender.name: Sunil
lender.loan_because: Live and let live.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites and web applications.

lender.name: CCCSM
lender.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Making the world a better place on person at a time.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: Giving is the part of life that always returns more than you invest.

lender.name: Louisville High Justice
lender.loan_because: We are students of Social Justice in a Catholic school. We believe we can be the change we wish to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We learn about the world, its history, and its current reality. We volunteer as cooks in soup kitchens, as tutors in schools, as environmentalists, and as builders of homes with Habitat for Humanity. By our study and by our efforts, we seek to help eradicate hunger and poverty.

lender.name: Emily & Brent
lender.loan_because: We can! We think lending money to small, grassroots businesses is the way to go. Change begins with the individual!

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in this idea.

lender.name: Lorena
lender.loan_because: Those who give, receive.
lender.occupational_info: I work towards inner peace and knowledge of the self.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I can think of times in life when it would have helped to have someone believe in me.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: On behalf of Laureate Theta Phi, a women's philanthropic/friendship organization, we are excited to sponsor women toward economic independence.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a secure way to make a difference. I would like to think that if the circumstances were reversed, I might be able to turn to someone who could share their faith that I might create a better life for myself and my family in this very practical way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that brings together people who want to study and learn from master musicians, writers and dancers. They come primarily from No. America, but each year our program faculty expands - this past summer we had a wonderfully talented musician from So Africa who came and shared his unique style with many many people. Check out our website www.centrum.org/slide/2007

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jasmeet
lender.loan_because: Make a difference.

lender.name: Alasdair
lender.occupational_info: I teach students who would like to work for governmental or non-governmental organizations that provide public services.

lender.name: Pimiskerns
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help people in need without going over and beyond. What I mean is giving them money to help start a business without adopting them.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and try and get good grades so I can get a good and fun job in the future and have a good life. SGLP

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe in the system. I love seeing my loan directly affect a person's lifestyle, and then using it again to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Applied Mathematics master's student, graduate assistant/instructor, and tutor.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: My son & I are loaning together. We are very excited to help another family achieve their goals. My son really likes to help people. Kiva is a great place to show him how our small gifts can multiply for others.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I like seeing entreprenuers do their thing.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Through Kiva I can help people build their businesses. That makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a state government agency that helps out of work people by paying them money while they look for work or sometimes with training so they can find new jobs.

lender.name: Patrick Hayden
lender.loan_because: The concept is brilliant, a small amount of money can make such a difference and with this site you can give your gift again and again.
lender.occupational_info: I help city and county governments to implement software to streamline their customer service and better server their communities.

lender.name: Shree
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a good way to 'spend' your money wisely. It is a productive means through which I can gain real value for my money. And, with each cycle, I can push my money forward that much more by regularly investing into a business on a monthly basis and reinvesting the money from the loans once they're paid back.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and help newly arrived refugees to the United States.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I work at Warner Brothers in Burbank.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: i want to upgrade and expand my business to create more profit and employment. I use my one room apartment as my office and it is no longer conduicive because of family responsibilities. so i want to secure a small office space and raise my magazine production, since the demand is high but no capital to meet the demand.
lender.occupational_info: i publish a youth magazine in cartoon form, the name of the magazine is Educator Magazine

lender.name: Sami
lender.loan_because: We need to share and eradicate poverty from this planet. Smart entrepreneurs are all around the world. They just need to get a fair chance, the means to make their dreams happen. Let's all forget about ethinicity, race, religion, skin color and personal prefences - we'll make this a better world where projects can get financed.
lender.occupational_info: Developing trading software - incredibly lucky to get such a great job and great company.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe in you and trust that you will help others too when you do well in your business. May God bless your business.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies solve business problems and make them better companies.

lender.name: Marcos
lender.loan_because: I think some good may come out of it and because there are those who are in greater need than I am. As an atheist and a humanist I hope that it is one way to contribute to the world balance.

lender.name: Johan & Lisa
lender.loan_because: We happen to be born in the rich part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Johan does research in applied mathematics and Lisa works as a social worker in a school.

lender.name: Christine
lender.occupation: Internet Cafe and secretarial Service provider

lender.loan_because:
There is just too much disparity between people like me who have so much and those who don't.

lender.occupational_info: I work at a multinational bank in their IT Security department. We make sure that the banks websites are safe and secure to prevent fraudsters from stealing money.

lender.occupational_info: I am a investment advisor, with a specialization in socially/environmentally responsible investing.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: "As I give, I get." Bethune, Mary McLeod African-American educator (1875-1955)
lender.occupational_info: In addition to raising my family, I try to also assist in improving lives, strengthening communities, and fostering civic engagement through service and volunteering.

lender.loan_because: I want do my very small part to help another child like me!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a year old so I sleep, eat, play, try to walk, babble & smile a lot.

lender.loan_because: I'm just helping people to help themselves.

lender.occupational_info: Nurse, missionary, researcher, fine art appraiser, visionary, and many more......

lender.name: Garnet

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I feel as though this is the least I can do for my fellowmen. I am currently limited in what I am able to contribute to society and God's Kingdom right now. So, this is a simple and amazing chance to step in and help out.

lender.name: whitney
lender.loan_because: i believe that "to whom much is given, much is expected"
lender.occupational_info: my hope is that i will be a stepping stone in the life of a child whose education will break their cycle of poverty

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: my retirement plan
lender.occupational_info: Physician

lender.name: Ariel
lender.loan_because: I think it's good to help other help themselves. I'm not giving handouts, but handups. My Ethics teacher told me about this website during our discussion on Obligations to the Poor.

lender.name: Ed
lender.occupational_info: I try to encourage people to ride public transit or find other ways of getting to work rather than riding in a single-passenger automobile.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Loans and investments are the ladders that people use to improve their lives. I needed loans earlier in my life, and I owe my success partly to them. So it's natural for me to want to give some of that back.
lender.occupational_info: I work to enforce laws that protect the environment in Southern California.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Seems like a good idea :)

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: These loans are the only true way that people in these types of situations are able to grow and improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze data on websites

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Give someone a go
lender.occupational_info: Personal Development Help individuals let go of emotional feelings that are holding them back from living their dream.

lender.name: suresh
lender.loan_because: To make this world a better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: A computer programmer.

lender.name: Magnus
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people!
lender.occupational_info: Right now i'm studying at the university so that i can become a history and religion teacher

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: it is exciting to see how my money can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant with audits and label checks within the food industry.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help other people directly.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: I can. Thanks to the disparities in our global economy, a month's rent for me is a year's working capital for some hard working person. I can afford to skip a night out once in a while to let someone work toward their dream.

lender.name: eleven:eleven coaching
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the comfort and security that comes from pursuing opportunities. What could be better than helping enable others to achieve the same? Those willing to work for their own dreams deserve every advantage to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to see how talented they are, and show them how to use their ability to make the world better for all of us.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's so easy to help and such a small commitment that will make such a big difference for deserving entrepreneurs that how can you say no?!
lender.occupational_info: I write grants to raise private funding for a scientific and educational nonprofit organization

lender.name: Tracy
lender.occupational_info: I study climate change and arctic sea ice

lender.name: Razak
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a powerful way to give the less fortunate a way to advance their life in a way they otherwise are unable to. The power of knowing you made your money and paid off your debts and made who you are yourself is undoubtably so much better than giving outright. This is the combination of the two.
lender.occupational_info: Recent Grad at UW-Madison, currently working at a tech support job and in process of writing my first novel.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to open a used clothing store someday, so I wanted to help out someone with similar passions.

lender.name: Ginny
lender.loan_because: I believe in economic potential.
lender.occupational_info: I sell makeup and hair products to stores to get them to sell them to their customers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others to reach their goals.

lender.name: jani
lender.loan_because:
"Be the change you want to see in the world."
Gandhi

lender.name: Molli
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should be given the chance to succeed in life regardless of where or when they were born. If we each do a little bit it will, in the end, make a big difference for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I act as a technical resource for the people I work with, write technical materials, and provide technical training for my company's employees.

lender.name: Sonya
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money in my eyes, based on the good life I have been given, can positively impact other lives around the world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing my good fortune with the less fortunate so that they can help improve their life.

lender.occupational_info: I plan conventions and special events for large corporations throughout the world

lender.name: Jarrod

lender.name: Mary Ann
